site.siteTagline: The Gaia-X lighthouse project for manufacturing

warning.polygonPublish: Only republish data sets with a pool from ETH Mainnet into Polygon/Matic if the liquidity is **less than or equal to 1000 OCEAN in the original pool**. Doing otherwise will lead to [purgatory](https://github.com/oceanprotocol/list-purgatory) for the data set in Polygon/Matic.

announcement.polygon: Polygon/Matic EVM support is in early stages. [Use the Polygon Bridge](https://docs.oceanprotocol.com/tutorials/polygon-bridge/) to get mOCEAN.
